Experiment.Name: MusicEmotion
Experiment.ExperimentDescription: This experiment investigates the confidence effect of music emotion elicitation.
Experiment.FooterLabel: For questions or comments contact us via this {{link|mailto:jenma@dtu.dk?subject=Comment%2520about%2520MusicEmotion%26amp;body=%250D%250A%250D%250A%250D%250A%250D%250A%250D%250AExperiment%2520ID%250D%250A(a9f56a58-bbbb-eeee-1355-aa435ed70001)|e-mail}}.

Instrument.Text: {{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|Thank you for your interest and your participation in this listening experiment.}}}}{{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|The experiment focuses on the emotions expressed in music.}}}}{{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|It will take approximately 50 minutes to complete. You can follow your progress in the bottom right corner.}}}}{{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|The experiment is divided in two parts, in between these two parts you can take a short break if you need.}}}}{{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|In the end of the experiment, you will be presented with a link you press to get your free cinema ticket, for a danish cinema of your choice.}}}}

{{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|The experiment concentrates on rating musical excerpts using the emotions expressed in the music.}}}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|The emotions expressed in music are different from how the music makes you feel.}}}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|So focus on what emotions the music expresses and try the best you can not to rate excerpts based on how the music makes you feel.}}}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|For example, you think some music sounds very negative, but for some reason the music makes you feel positive.}}}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|Then you should not rate it as being positive but rather negative, since this is what you think the music expresses.}}}}{{n}}

{{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|To capture the emotions expressed in the music we will ask you to use the two aspects of {{b|valence}} and {{b|arousal}}. }}}}{{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|{{b|Valence}} is described as the aspect of emotions in music that ranges from }}}} {{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|(unpleasant/bad/negative) to (pleasant/good/positive) }}}} {{n}}{{n}}{{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|{{b|Arousal}} is described as the aspect of emotions in music that ranges from }}}} {{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|(sleepy/tired/drowsy) to (alert/wakeful/awake) }}}} {{n}}{{n}}{{n}}{{n}}

{{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|The experiment will be as follows, there are two different parts of the experiment.}}}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|Each part will start with you answering some questions, followed by annotation of musical stimuli.}}}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|You will be asked to listen to a number of excerpts and rate them on the valence and arousal scales.}}}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|After each rating, you will be asked to answer how sure you were of your rating.}}}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|Please carefully (re)evaluate each excerpt, even if you are asked to rate the same excerpt more than once.}}}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 16px;|Remember this is not a test, there is no such thing as right or wrong answers so please answer honestly on all ratings.}}}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 14px;|{{n}}{{n}}{{n}}Data collection and analysis is performed in accordance with the Danish Act of Processing of Personal Data.}}}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 14px;|No sensitive or confidential data (name, address, social security number etc.) is saved after the completion of the experiment.}}}}{{n}}
{{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 20px;|These are the scales you will use in the first part of the experiment to rate each of the musical excerpts.}}}}

Instrument.HeaderLabel: {{center|{{style|font-size: 25px;|Valence scale}}}}
{{center|{{style|font-size: 25px;|Arousal scale}}}}

Instrument.Text: {{n}}{{center|Please adjust the volume so that the music is played at a pleasent level}}. {{center|After you have found an appropriate listening level, please refrain from adjusting the volume throughout the experiment}}

Instrument.HeaderLabel: Have you adjusted the volume appropriately?

Instrument.Text: Please answer the following questions about yourself.

Instrument.HeaderLabel: Do you have any hearing disorders
Gender

Instrument.Label: What instrument(s) do you play? (separate by comma)
How many hour(s) a day do you actively listen to music? {{n}} (i.e. you select what music to listen to)
How many hour(s) a day do you passively listen to music? {{n}} (e.g. radio, premade playlists, etc.)?
How many year(s) of musical training have you had? {{n}} (e.g. playing an instrument, theoretical training, etc.)
How many hour(s) a day do you play an instrument?
How many times have you participated{{n}}in a listening experiment before?
How many times have you participated{{n}}in a listening experiment regarding emotions and audio?

Instrument.HeaderLabel: How would you rate your own mood right now on the {{n}}{{n}} Valence scale
How would you rate your own mood right now on the {{n}}{{n}} Arousal scale

Instrument.Text: {{n}}{{n}}{{center|{{style|font-size: 27px;|Now we are ready to start the first part of the experiment}}}}{{n}}

Instrument.Label: What would make you rate something with a low confidence rating?
What would make you rate something with a high confidence rating?
What would make you rate something high on the valence or arousal scale?
What would make you rate something in the middle on the valence or arousal scale?
What would make you rate something low on the valence or arousal scale??
Do you have any general comments about the experiment?

Instrument.Text: {{center|{{style|font-size: 27px;|Thank you for participating! :D}}}} {{n}}{{n}}{{n}} {{center|To claim your free movie ticket for a danish movie theater please press {{link|mailto:jenma@dtu.dk?subject=ClaimTicket%2520for%2520MusicEmotion%26amp;body=%250D%250A%250D%250A%250D%250A%250D%250A%250D%250AExperiment%2520ID%250D%250A(a9f56a58-bbbb-eeee-1355-aa435ed70001)%250D%250A%250D%250Acode=HHFSpU2jPNSUYgaoavlXL3tz8HppJi2Dr3Z81lCXU5n9LcItFHPCgTWiZyzw4E7e|here}} and send an email.}} {{n}}{{n}} {{center|You will then after a verification of your answers receive an email with the ticket.}}

{{n}}{{n}}{{n}} {{center|If you cannot get the link to work send and email to jenma@dtu.dk with these two lines{{n}}{{n}} codes=HHFSpU2jPNSUYgaoavlXL3tz8HppJi2Dr3Z81lCXU5n9LcItFHPCgTWiZyzw4E7e {{n}} exid=a9f56a58-bbbb-eeee-1355-aa435ed70001 {{n}}{{n}} in the mail }}
